```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
```

```{r}
url = "http://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm"
drug_use_html = read_html(url)

drug_use_html
```

Get the pieces I actually need

```{r}
drug_use_html |>
  html_table()
```

```{r}
table_marj = 
  drug_use_html |> 
  html_table() |> 
  first() 
```

```{r}
table_marj = 
  drug_use_html |> 
  html_table() |> 
  first() |>
  slice(-1) 

table_marj
```
